section.title: Convert an Image from RAW to QCOW2
section.para:
RAW images, though simple to work with, carry the disadvantage of increased disk usage on the host OS. One option we have is to convert the image into the QCOW2 format which uses zlib compression and optionally allows for 128 bit AES encryption.
